summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 4, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms detailing inmate population and assignments. The most significant entry is the roster showing Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to an attorney visit (ATTY) that day.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates and recording of assignments (e.g., work details, attorney visits, hospital) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 4, 2019.
An inmate roster for August 4, 2019, shows Epstein had an 'ATTY' (attorney) assignment that day.
The document shows standard Bureau of Prisons administrative procedures, including population counts and out-count forms.
The total inmate population at MCC New York on this date was recorded as 762 during one count.
Other inmates listed include individuals with assignments to food service (FS), warehouse, and hospital (HOSP).
